2/24/2016
upgrading to 1.8 lib

12/5/13
SOIL.lib : library for simple opengl image library (used to save and load images)
7/9/13
Kinect10.lib : basic kinect functionality for c++.  this is from version 1.7 of ms kinect sdk
KinectInteraction170_32.dll, .lib : kinect ui uses interaction for hand grab functionality
